description: Economists have since ages tried to define economic recession in the exact form; however the widely accepted technical definition of economic recession is related with the GDP growth in a country. When the GDP of a nation shows a decline in more than two quarters or more, an economic recession is said to have set in. It is usually headed by several quarters of slowing economic growth. Learn all about hot to survive an economic recession, what businesses are recession proof, what leads up to a recession and much much more in our Economic Recession An Overview ebook. Download this comprehensive case study today!
